name: Egghead Adventures
description: Welcome to Egghead Adventures! When you look at some of the screenshots you might see bad graphics. Don't let the graphics fool you, because things aren't always as they seem. Play and you'll unveil many hidden secrets, along with difficult challenges. Help this egg discover many hidden truths by jumping your way to the end of the level! Certain blocks have certain abilities. One of the most important things is to not let your health hit zero, or else you must restart the level. Have fun and good luck! (You're going to need it)
